original_text:
my transgression would be sealed up in a bag,
    and you would cover over my iniquity.
korean_text: 주는 내 허물을 주머니에 봉하시고 내 죄악을 싸매시나이다

sentences.original_text: my transgression would be sealed up in a bag
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 허물은 자루 안에 봉인될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and you would cover over my iniquity.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 나의 죄악을 덮어 주실 것입니다
